title: Battle on buka street
overview: This a story about two sisters Yejide and Awele whose rivalry dates back to before their childhood. Their mothers, Asake and Ezinne, both married to their father Maduka, were jealous and conflicted with each other, and this carried on to their children Yejide and Awele. Yejide runs the most patronized buka (stall) in Otanwa community's "Buka Street" with help from her mother Asake and her children. However, her stepsister Awele buys the neighboring shop one day and starts competing.
originalLanguage: English, yoruba, igbo, hausa, Nigerian pidgin

casts.name: Funke Akindele, Mercy Johnson, Sola Sobowale, Tina Mba, Nkem Owoh, Femi Jacobs, Kelvin Ikeduba

producers: Funke Akindele, Nicole Ofoegbu, FilmOne Studio
